Package org.tweetyproject.logics.fol.reasoner

Class SpassFolReasoner

java.lang.Object
org.tweetyproject.logics.fol.reasoner.FolReasoner
org.tweetyproject.logics.fol.reasoner.SpassFolReasoner
All Implemented Interfaces:
QualitativeReasoner<FolBeliefSet,FolFormula>, Reasoner<Boolean,FolBeliefSet,FolFormula>
public class SpassFolReasoner extends FolReasoner
Invokes SPASS (http://www.mpi-inf.mpg.de/departments/automation-of-logic/software/spass-workbench/), an automated theorem prover for first-order logic, modal logic and description logics.
Author:
Anna Gessler

    • queryProof

      public String queryProof(FolBeliefSet kb, Formula query)
      Determines the answer wrt. to the given query and returns the proof (if applicable). May decrease SPASS's performance, use query(FolBeliefSet,FolFormula) if only a yes/no result is needed.
      Parameters:
      kb - the knowledge base
      query - a formula
      Returns:
      a string containing proof documentation
